seed_pair.target: Esa estudiante tiene las dos manos arriba.
seed_pair.known: That student has both of her hands up.

S0314: Pienso que ella podría ponerlo en la mesa.
I think that she could put it on the table.
S0315: Pienso que no podría permitirse el coche que quería.
I think that he couldn't afford the car that he wanted.
S0316: ¿Crees que ella podría traer a su hermano el lunes?
Do you think that she could bring her brother on Monday?
S0317: Sí pienso que podría si quisiera.
Yes I think she could if she wanted to.
S0318: No, no creo que pudiera esta vez.
No I don't think she could this time.
S0319: Ella necesita mudarse a un país diferente.
She needs to move to a different country.
S0320: Él no necesita comprar otra televisión este año.
He doesn't need to buy another television this year.
S0322: Ella dijo que necesita leer el mismo libro.
She said that she needs to read the same book.
S0323: Él dijo que no necesita caminar a la escuela.
He said that he doesn't need to walk to school.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
